artists.strBiographyEN:
盧廣仲 (Crowd Lu) is a talented male singer and songwriter from Taiwan. After a traffic accident he decided to pick up his guitar and began his road as a singer.

The 3 singles issued afterwards proved his success, over 10,000 copies were sold.  With numerous live performances, he's gradually becoming more and more popular, especially among students.  In May 2008, Crowd's first album "100 Ways of Living" was released. 

His video imitating Russian tenor Vitas from the Hit FM website has over 1,000,000 views on YouTube.
